document_title: Foreskin inflammation: Causes, signs and prevention
subsection_content:
To reduce the risk of foreskin inflammation, men should note:
Treat risk factors such as phimosis, long foreskin, etc.; Clean the genitals properly every day, especially the foreskin groove. Be careful to avoid vigorous scrubbing because it will scratch and damage the foreskin; Avoid using soap and detergents that are too alkaline to clean the genitals. Because they can cause irritation, dryness and discomfort. Instead, men should choose soaps and men's hygiene solutions that have a balanced pH level.; Avoid masturbating too much: The number of masturbation times per week should only be 1 to 2. It is important that after masturbation, men do not feel tired, lose their health, or mentally affect their studies or work. job. In addition, it is necessary to carefully clean masturbation items after each use; Prioritize choosing pants with airy materials that do not tighten the private area to avoid rubbing the foreskin area, causing tightness and discomfort.
